snippet: The farmer-writer Wendell Berry is chosen to give the 2012 Jefferson Lecture in the Humanities, considered the federal government's most prestigious honor for intellectual achievement in the humanities.
abstract: The farmer-writer Wendell Berry is chosen to give the 2012 Jefferson Lecture in the Humanities, considered the federal government's most prestigious honor for intellectual achievement in the humanities.

headline.main: Wendell Berry to Give 2012 Jefferson Lecture
headline.print_headline: Wendell Berry to Give Jefferson Lecture
